posts.post_content:
Yep.  For those actually reading this, I'm looking for any early postcards depicting the Charlotte Hornets.  I've seen a copy depicting the 1909 team, which would be desirable.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
Very nice, one of my favs!
I love this difficult series, and the Rube is tremendous! What a find.
